scripts.clean: rimraf rerun.txt && rimraf allure-results.zip && rimraf allure-results && rimraf build && rimraf output && mkdirp output
scripts.debugprod-android: env DriverName=remote-android Platform=mobile DriverPoolSize=5 SessionIdleTimeout=10 node ./build/runner.js -p debugprod
scripts.debugprod-local: env DriverName=local-chrome Platform=desktop DriverPoolSize=5 SessionIdleTimeout=10 node ./build/runner.js -p debugprod
scripts.debugprod-rerun: env DriverName=local-chrome Platform=desktop DriverPoolSize=5 SessionIdleTimeout=10 node ./build/runner.js -p debugrerun @rerun.txt
scripts.ck-debug-local-mobile: env Brand=ck Site=localhost DriverName=local-mobile-simulator Platform=mobile cucumber-js -p debug
scripts.ck-debug-mobile: env Brand=ck DriverName=local-mobile-simulator Platform=mobile cucumber-js -p debug
scripts.ck-debug-mobile-headless: env Brand=ck DriverName=localhost-mobile-headless Platform=mobile cucumber-js -p debug
scripts.ck-debug-tablet: env Brand=ck DriverName=local-tablet-simulator Platform=tablet cucumber-js -p debug
scripts.ck-debug-android: env Brand=ck DriverName=remote-android Platform=mobile cucumber-js -p debug
scripts.ck-debug-ios: env Brand=ck DriverName=remote-ios Platform=mobile cucumber-js -p debug
scripts.ck-debug-bs-ios: env Brand=ck DriverName=browserstack-ios Platform=mobile cucumber-js -p debug
scripts.ck-generate-scenario-report: cucumber-js features/ck --dry-run --format json:scenario-reports/output/ck-all-features.json || true && env Brand=ck node scenario-reports/scripts/scenario-report.js && rm -rf ./scenario-reports/output/*.json
scripts.th-generate-scenario-report: cucumber-js features/th --dry-run --format json:scenario-reports/output/th-all-features.json || true && env Brand=th node scenario-reports/scripts/scenario-report.js && rm -rf ./scenario-reports/output/*.json
scripts.generate-issue-report: cucumber-js features/ck --dry-run --format json:output/ck-all-features.json || VER>NUL && cucumber-js features/th --dry-run --format json:output/th-all-features.json || VER>NUL && node build/core/xray/jira-issue-report.js && rimraf ./output/*all-features.json
scripts.ck-generate-locale-report: cucumber-js features/ck --dry-run --format json:scenario-reports/output/ck-full-regression-features.json --tags "(@FullRegression or @Sprint) and @Desktop and @Chrome and not @ExcludeUat" || true && env Brand=ck node scenario-reports/scripts/locale-report.js && rm -rf ./scenario-reports/output/*.json
scripts.th-generate-locale-report: cucumber-js features/th --dry-run --format json:scenario-reports/output/th-full-regression-features.json --tags "(@FullRegression or @Sprint) and @Desktop and @Chrome and not @ExcludeUat" || true && env Brand=th node scenario-reports/scripts/locale-report.js && rm -rf ./scenario-reports/output/*.json
scripts.generate-gap-analysis-report: cucumber-js features --dry-run --format json:scenario-reports/output/all-features.json || true && node scenario-reports/scripts/gap-report.js && rm -rf ./scenario-reports/output/*.json
scripts.generate-all-reports: npm run report-cleanup && npm run ck-generate-scenario-report && npm run th-generate-scenario-report && npm run ck-generate-locale-report && npm run th-generate-locale-report && npm run generate-gap-analysis-report
scripts.ck:smoke:pdp: CUCUMBER_PARALLEL=true NO_ALLURE=true STRICT_SSL=false Site=localhost Brand=ck DriverName=localhost-headless DriverPoolSize=1 node ./build/runner.js -p prodci --tags '@FullRegression and @Desktop and @Chrome and @EESK and @RCTest and @PDP and not @SkipCKMR'
scripts.ck:smoke:plp: CUCUMBER_PARALLEL=true NO_ALLURE=true STRICT_SSL=false Site=localhost Brand=ck DriverName=localhost-headless DriverPoolSize=1 node ./build/runner.js -p prodci --tags '@FullRegression and @Desktop and @Chrome and @EESK and @RCTest and @PLP and not @SkipCKMR'
scripts.ck:smoke:mob:pdp: CUCUMBER_PARALLEL=true NO_ALLURE=true STRICT_SSL=false Site=localhost Brand=ck DriverName=localhost-mobile-headless Platform=mobile DriverPoolSize=1 node ./build/runner.js -p prodci --tags '@FullRegression and @Mobile and @Chrome and @EESK and @RCTest and @PDP and not @SkipCKMR'
scripts.ck:smoke:mob:plp: CUCUMBER_PARALLEL=true NO_ALLURE=true STRICT_SSL=false Site=localhost Brand=ck DriverName=localhost-mobile-headless Platform=mobile DriverPoolSize=1 node ./build/runner.js -p prodci --tags '@FullRegression and @Mobile and @Chrome and @EESK and @RCTest and @PLP and not @SkipCKMR'
